projects.title: OnlyData
projects.text: OnlyData is a data visualization website that displays Canadian statistics. It updates the data using Github-actions on a regular basis. Written in React JS.

projects.title: Storyline
projects.text: A web app that displays articles corresponding to the year and topic entered by the user. You can travel back in time by browsing articles from the past generated from a list using Google News RSS feed.

projects.title: Drive Simulation
projects.text: 2D driving simulator that captures the physics of a vehicle being driven. Includes obstacles and terrain that interacts with the vehicle. Written in Python using the PyGame library.

projects.title: NewPlayer
projects.text: A video manipulation program that can swap the face of a person in a video with the face of a different person in an image selected by the user. Written in C++ using wxWidgets for the GUI. It uses OpenCV and dlib for image processing.
